


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->

# ```js isJson ```


Check if the passed value is a valid json

## Parameters

- **value**  Mixed: The value to check



## Example (js)

```js
import isJson from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/json'
if (isJson('[{id:10}]')) {
  // do something
}
```
